meanings.definition: A person or thing that inspires.
meanings.sent1: Teachers can be great inspirers for their students.
meanings.sent2: The artist looked to famous inspirers for creative ideas.
meanings.sent3: The little girl's cat was her main inspirers for playing dress-up.
meanings.sent4: Nature's beauty can be the ultimate inspirers for poets.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the character as a true inspirers to all who watched.

meanings.definition: Those who provide inspiration or motivation.
meanings.sent1: Inspirers like Martin Luther King Jr. have left a lasting impact on society.
meanings.sent2: The team captain was known as one of the best inspirers in the league.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his dog was his main inspirers for getting out of bed in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun served as a powerful inspirers for new beginnings.
meanings.sent5: The book highlighted the unsung inspirers behind famous inventions.
